node.title: Man arrested after stealing, crashing police car
node.description: He will likely face a number of charges.
node.content: ["A man who was involved in a crash has been arrested after he stole the police car which was responding to the accident.\u00a0", "Emergency services were notified of a crash on State Highway 38 in Kaingaroa Forest near Bay of Plenty at 8:30am on Thursday.\u00a0", "Police say two people were seriously injured in the crash and a third became aggressive with ambulance staff before attempting to leave the scene.\u00a0", "Police tried to restrain the man however he was able to get into a police car and drive away, heading towards Murupara.", "The man subsequently crashed the police car near McKee Road.\u00a0\u00a0", "He wasn't seriously injured in the crash and has been taken into custody. He will likely face a number of charges.\u00a0"]
